p: By 2100, BES is not competitive in MS430–480 under any conditions (note the absence of bars for BES in this scenario in 2100 in Fig. 4a). In MS650–720, on the other hand, BES maintains its competitiveness in 2100 only when a combination of factors are all seen, including a high carbon intensity (+1.6 σ), low carbon prices (−1.5 σ), high cost of carbon capture and storage (+1.6 σ), and a low fraction of CO 2 being sequestered by BECCS (−1.0 σ).
